headline: Digital Media Specialist
summary:
Kaylan is a public affairs specialist for U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) with more than ten years of experience in public affairs and digital marketing. She is responsible for ICE's social media presence and leads all digital marketing projects. She manages both internal and external content. 

Prior to joining ICE, Kaylan served as a communications specialist for the U.S. Secret Service, where she spearheaded the agencyâs social media efforts, as well as their online presence, both internal and external, and oversaw a wide range of media and public relations activities.  Prior to that, she served as Internet Director for the White House where she managed whitehouse.gov and online communications. 

Specialties: Social & Digital Media, Public Affairs, Media Relations, e-Communications, Internet, Digital Marketing

defaultPosition.description:
â¢	Corporate digital communications strategy to include social media, website, and marketing. Developed and implemented an omni-channel plan for agency branding on digital outlets. 
        -     During tenure, social media has increased more than 90% for the agency due to leadership of our team and development of a social media content calendar and weekly metrics reports.
â¢	Coordinated high profile social media campaigns. Overall social media decision maker and strategy director for high profile social media campaigns to include Super Bowl 50, Super Bowl LI, Super Bowl LII; Most Wanted fugitives; Operation Predator. Executed daily updates for all platforms.
â¢	Identify and create online content strategy to showcase the agency, press releases, events, and promotional material across our various social media platforms. Oversee field social media accounts. 
â¢	Acting supervisor for Strategic Communications branch
â¢	Acting supervisor for Digital Marketing and Outreach branch
â¢	Project management. Served as project manager, subject matter expert, and lead of a cross-sector team.
â¢	Develop, execute, measure and refine integrated marketing plans (e.g. social media, website, events, digital, and content marketing)
â¢	Generate reports on social media and digital campaigns to demonstrate ROI and provide insights for strategies to utilize in the future.
â¢	Trained and educated colleagues on the use of social media products, trends, and practices regarding social media and online marketing.
â¢	Established strong partnerships. Drove program support and engagement by solidifying partnerships with key stakeholders within the agency and with external partners (media; Federal, state, and local governments; members of professional, business, civic, and other public interest organizations)

positions.title: Digital Media Specialist

positions.description:
â¢	Spearheaded the agency's social media and Internet-based strategies, including implementing and developing the Secret Service Twitter account, transforming a non-existent social media presence into one of the most visible and utilized platforms for the agency. 
â¢	Responsible for the content, design and function of the Secret Service web site, where I implemented a site redesign. 
â¢	Other duties included: writing and disseminating press releases, brochures and other public relations tools, developing and maintaining relationships with national and local media, coordinating with federal, state and local agencies, developing talking points and communication plans, writing articles for our internal publications, assisting with speech writing, designing and editing material for internal and external distribution, planning and executing conferences, building and maintaining relationships with vendors, suppliers and exhibitors, and coordinating high profile events with senior level officials.
positions.title: Communications Specialist

positions.description: Worked with Microsoft SQL Server, assessed and processed data for various campaigns. Monitored state and local political contributions and collected records.
positions.title: Project Manager

In charge of large scale projects, such as updating the First Ladyâs portion of the website.

Worked closely with clients on their personal estate and trust matters.
